channel.title: What good pking skill should i train?
channel.description:
Hey! :D
What next skill/quests should i train/do because i really wanna go own some people in new wildy but i feel unprepare.
[b]Recipe for disaster[/b] [b](Done) (I can access barrows gloves) [/b] [b]Desert treasure[/b] [b](Done) (i can access ancients)[/b] [b]Lost City[/b] [b](Done) ( I can access DDS = Dragon dagger S)[/b] [img]http://oi51.tinypic.com/20shm69.jpg[/img] [b]Much more![/b] [img]http://oi51.tinypic.com/22de8o.jpg[/img][img]http://oi51.tinypic.com/1r2h76.jpg[/img]

item.title: What good pking skill should i train?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“recker450, post:21, topic:381491”]Get 99 def, and they’ll be “Def noob”
and hitting 0’s

One who can’t be hit, usually wins[/quote]
Right.
How long have you been playing Runescape?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:18, topic:381491”][quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=477303.msg3492569#msg3492569 date=1297035555]
Defence is really all you need.
If your going to get prayer, then you will need 95 before going in as Peity > curses.
[/quote]
lolwut[/quote]

Without having 92/95 prayer, normal prayer is better than curses…

item.title: What good pking skill should i train?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Rich, post:11, topic:381491”]He’s already 99 strength and ranging, so I don’t think he needs to worry about those… and extreme potions (nor overloads) can be used in the Wilderness or any dangerous PvP activities.[/quote]Oh wow, I didn’t even notice his stats ._. And i didn’t know about the extremes not being able to be used in PvP.

Read full topic
item.source: What good pking skill should i train?

item.title: What good pking skill should i train?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:1, topic:381545"][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=477303.msg3492520#msg3492520 date=1297031959]
Oh hmm right, didn’t pay too much attention. They can be used, but they’re as effective as using a super version.
[/quote]

Wrong, they can’t be brought in to the wilderness but if they are used and a player walks into the wilderness their affects will be lowered to that of a super potion’s.[/quote]
I didn’t know that

Read full topic

item.title: What good pking skill should i train?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Pk Range502:

old wildy

Fixed.

Get strength, ranged, and magic up high, along with herblore for extreme potions and high damage. All I can really say skill-wise.

item.description:
@nacional wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:7, topic:381491”][quote author=Pk Range502 link=topic=477303.msg3492082#msg3492082 date=1297012899]

firemaking

Firemaking isnt pking skills?
[/quote]
troll’d[/quote]

well firemaking for handcannon. but I doubt he meant that.
so yeah troll’d

Read full topic
item.source: What good pking skill should i train?

item.title: What good pking skill should i train?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Don’t train prayer at all unless you have the money for 95 - Get 99 magic and defense, and you should be set. Summoning doesn’t really matter since it doesn’t effect your combat level in the Wilderness, unless you feel like running around with a Pack Yak filled completely with brews.

And dungeoneering is completely irrelevant to the wilderness unless you’re planning on pking with a chaotic.

Read full topic
